QuestData.Title: War Prototype
QuestData.Description:
As Forgelite Prime, I always work to make something better!
But largest centurions, they are much too large to bring to Korthia. This, I fix. Here is Atleos, field colossus prototype. Vanguard of the Kyrian!
It needs testing. More testing. Must be perfect against a powerful opponent.
Go, take Atleos and defeat a great Maw beast! Press all the buttons!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Atleos prototype in the Windswept Aerie to defeat Kraxis.
QuestData.RewardText: Ha! Perfect victory. Atleos returns, and you do too.
